Five Stars
Three Movies of the Heart: Change of Heart, Her Desperate Choice, The Truth About Jane (3 Disc Set)
Stockard Channing  (Actor),     Jean Smart  (Actor),     Arvin Brown  (Director),     Michael Scott  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, LGBT
["Three emotional and dramatic Movies of the Heart:Change of Heart - Beneath Jim Marshall's (John Terry) veneer as the all-American father and husband lies a long suppressed desire that is about to ruin his idyllic family. When Elaine Marshall (Jean Smart) catches her husband and his lover in a hotel room, her anger quickly turns to shock as she discovers that Jim's paramour is a young man. What ensues is painful soul-searching for Jim, Elaine, and their family.Her Desperate Choice - Despite allegations of sexual abuse against her ex-husband, Jody (Faith Ford) has lost a custody battle for Samantha (Hanna Hall) and faces a choice of turning her daughter over to him, or taking flight and risking kidnapping charges. Pursued by both the FBI and a private detective, Jody and Samantha become hunted animals, fleeing from town to town with the help of an Underground Railroad set up to help women and children escape from abuse.The Truth About Jane - Jane's mom (Stockard Channing) assumes her daughter is just like every other sixteen-year-old girl - a little confused about growing up. Jane (Ellen Muth) figures her mom is just like every other mom - a little too protective, but loving. They figure they have a good relationship, until Jane falls in love with the new girl at school. Jane knows she is gay but her mom is completely unwilling to accept this fact. Their mother-daughter relationship is broken unless they can find a way to remember how much they love each other."]

Five Stars
Wild Horse Redemption
Various  (Actor),     John Zaritsky  (Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Documentary
["Wild horses have long roamed the American West. To keep populations stable and sustainable on public lands, thousands of these magnificent creatures are taken from their herds each year and trained, sold, or put out to pasture. Some of the horses end up in the Wild Horse Inmate Program, through which inmates at the East Canon Correctional Complex (East Canon, CO) learn the non-coercive methods of horse whisperers to tame and train the horses for adoption. THE WILD HORSE REDEMPTION traces the incredible stories of both the horses and the inmates, masterfully intertwining their parallel fates and their mutual struggle towards rehabilitation. The inmates' progress with their horses depends upon their ability to cultivate patience, fortitude, and empathy; interestingly, too, it is through the recognition of themselves in these wild animals that they better understand their own lives. The most stirring moments of this film capture the intimacy forged between beast and man in the dramatic space of the training ring, where both undergo extraordinary transformations. Beautifully shot in the rugged foothills and big skies of southern Colorado, THE WILD HORSE REDEMPTION takes viewers on an intimate and uplifting journey of freedom, discipline, and redemption."]

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user exhibits a strong affinity for media that features compelling storytelling and character development, especially in the fantasy, adventure, drama, and documentary genres. Their recent interactions emphasize an appreciation for narratives rich in empathy, rehabilitation, and transformative relationships, underscoring a preference for emotionally resonant content. 

They recently provided a perfect rating of 5.0 for a highly enjoyable series, contributing to a remarkable average rating of 4.9, reflecting their consistent enjoyment of high-quality storytelling. The user expresses their connection to media through succinct reviews that showcase emotional engagement while exploring complex character arcs and significant conflicts.

This user continues to prefer enhanced audio options and varied subtitles but remains concerned about the availability of subtitles in some content. Their openness to adult themes and diverse perspectives informs their choices, as they prioritize impactful narratives that delve into the complexities of human experience. 

Overall, the user exemplifies discerning taste, consistently seeking out stories that resonate on personal levels and emphasize compassion and understanding throughout their viewing experiences. Their commitment to narratives that explore emotional depth and complexity enhances their engagement with the media they consume.
